Posts.Content: Hello, my name is Michelle and I am a 42 year old married mother of two one almost eight and one almost two.  I originally had breast cancer in 2004 and it has come back in may of 2007.   I chose alternative treatment up until my last scan in October where it has spread all over including my liver and lungs.  I am getting chemotherapy once a week Taxol and once a month  I get Aredia.  I get treatments every Tuesday and I am doing well with them.  I would love to hear from anyone who has had success in shrinking cancer in liver and lungs.I just finished my fifth chemo treatment last Tuesday. Michelle
Posts.Title: Metastasis breast cancer

Posts.Content: I was 100%vegan all organic foods lots of herbs accupuncture, yoga treatment centers to detox and cleans the body. nothing but natural and organic in and on my body.  jucing wheatgrass sprouts etc.   Michelle
Posts.Title: Metastasis breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hello, i also have stage IV breast cancer and it is in my spine and bones liver  and lungs, I do know I started getting aredia once a month for the bone pains and my pain was a 10 and now it is completely gone it is amazing please ask your doctor about this.  I was on so much pain medicine before I started taking this.   Michelle
